subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors in San Francisco are asking a judge to send the track coach Trevor Graham to prison for 10 months while his lawyers are calling for probation. A jury convicted Graham of lying to authorities about his connection to an admitted steroids dealer during the Bay Area Laboratory Co-operative investigation.
